content: smaller needles row 1 rs k2 p2 k2 repeat to end bind off in pattern by binding off as usual but knit the row 2 ws p2 k2 p2 repeat to end knits and purl the purls as they appear repeat these two row until ribbing measures 11-12cm bind off in pattern by binding off as usual but knit the finishing knits and purl the purls as they appear weave in ends make and tie on optional pom poms to use place empty hot water bottle inside cover before finishing filling once you have made 2 pieces sew them together using mattress stitch make and tie on optional pom poms we love to see what you make tag your project on instagram using #makermakerstore to use place empty hot water bottle inside cover before filling 2 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2019
